column2: I turned it back on while holding down the shift key on my keyboard. What that did was force a ""refresh"" on the running services that goes on on your Mac. Click allow and now you should restart your computer to get out of safe mode and all should be well with this app and many others. This takes a little while to perform but if you do this correctly you will save yourself hours of headaches. Thats why I rated this app 5 stars and not the customer service or the problems that were experienced when trying to start it less. When the app is functioning it is GREAT!!!!
